One thing to add to my previous post where I said this:

> An idea your project brought to my mind was maybe a "roving eye"-
> like artist could be evolved: It could start out in the middle and 
> just decide on its own which directions to draw in and how much 
ink 
> to drop at each step.  You could feed it coordinates as well, but 
it 
> would decide on the order it to visit them.  
> 

You could also potentially let it see its own ink locally or as far 
out as you wanted (that would be the eye receptive field size).

Of course, who knows if this whole "roving pen" idea makes "better" 
art or not, but it's kind of interesting because it draws sort of 
like a human.

ken
